long_description: This SRAM XG-1080 10-speed cassette is part of the X0 component line and offers a massive gearing range along with light weight and trail-tested performance. Main body of cassette is constructed out of sturdy, stamped steel cogs; largest cog is made out of 7075 aluminum. Part of the X-Glide family, cassette is designed to optimize performance between the chain and cassette for fast, clean shifts. Open design of cassette enhances mud-clearing performance. 11-36 gearing delivers a versatile range of gears for all-around mountain biking performance; cassette includes 11, 12, 14, 16, 18, 21, 24, 28, 32 and 36-tooth cogs.
short_description: This SRAM XG-1080 10-speed cassette is part of the X0 component line and offers a massive gearing range along with light weight and trail-tested performance.
